mapper.select: select qna_idx, item_num, mem_email, qna_title, qna_contents, date_format(qna_writeDate, '%m.%d %H:%i') as qna_writeDate, qna_ans from qna where qna_save = 'Y' AND item_num = #{itemNum} order by qna_idx desc

select qna_comment_idx, qna_comment_content, date_format(qna_comment_writeDate, '%m.%d %H:%i') as qna_comment_writeDate from qna q inner join qna_comment qc on q.qna_idx = qc.qna_idx where q.qna_idx = #{qnaIdx}
select qna_idx, qna_contents, mem_email, date_format(qna_writeDate, '%m.%d %H:%i') as qna_writeDate,qna_comment_content from qna where qna_idx = #{qnaIdx}
select * from qna where qna_save = 'Y' order by qna_idx desc;
mapper.insert: insert into qna (item_num,mem_email,qna_title, qna_contents, qna_writeDate) values ( #{itemNum}, #{memEmail}, #{qnaTitle}, #{qnaContents}, now() )
mapper.update: update qna set qna_comment_content = #{qnaCommentContent}, qna_comment_writeDate = now(), qna_ans = 'Y' where qna_idx = #{qnaIdx}
mapper.delete: update qna set qna_save = 'N' where qna_idx = #{qnaIdx}
